name: One Button Warrior (Dazzlepuff)
description: One Click Warrior was made for the June 2021 Boundless Game Jam. The theme was one button and the entire game is controlled by just the mouse movement and only one button, left clicking. Explore the world with your big sword and vanquish enemies along the way. Explore the underground and take out the big enemy terrorizing the town with your newly learned sword techniques.
